summary: A young woman discovers she is the daughter of the infamous Dr. Jekyll, and begins to believe that she may also have a split personality, one of whom is a ruthless killer.
cast: John Agar|Gloria Talbott|Arthur Shields|John Dierkes|Mollie McCard|Martha Wentworth|Marjorie Stapp|Reita Green|Marel Page|Ken Terrell
